entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
